info.description: Just a cleaner look to this amazing website ;) This is a darker edition for you guys who prefers to brows around with a userstyle easier on the eyes. =================== Brighter yet nicer edition: http://userstyles.org/styles/98049/userstyles-org-bright-stylish-look =================== Please leave a rating if you liked the userstyle! Your Feedback is Highly Appreciated! Be sure to check out my other userstyles! http://userstyles.org/users/92431
